get.summary: Debug DNS resolution and URL reachability
get.description:
Test DNS resolution and URL reachability from the Lambda environment.

    This endpoint helps debug which DNS records the Lambda can see and which
    URLs are reachable. It performs both HTTP requests to test connectivity
    and DNS lookups using dig/nslookup commands.

    Parameters:
    - urls: Comma-separated list of URLs to test (e.g., "https://example.com,api.service.com")
    - hostnames: Comma-separated list of hostnames for DNS lookup (e.g., "example.com,api.service.com")
    - dns_method: DNS lookup method to use ("dig" or "nslookup", defaults to "dig")
    - timeout: Request timeout in seconds (defaults to 10)

ApideckWebhookEvent.title: ApideckWebhookEvent
ApideckWebhookEvent.description:
Enumeration of possible HRIS webhook events.

Attributes:
    EMPLOYEE_CREATED: Triggered when a new employee record is created.
    EMPLOYEE_UPDATED: Triggered when an existing employee record is updated.
    EMPLOYEE_DELETED: Triggered when an employee record is deleted.
    EMPLOYEE_TERMINATED: Triggered when an employee is terminated.
    ACCOUNTING_INVOICE_CREATED: Triggered when a new invoice is created.
    ACCOUNTING_INVOICE_UPDATED: Triggered when an existing invoice is updated.
    ACCOUNTING_INVOICE_DELETED: Triggered when an invoice is deleted.
    ACCOUNTING_INVOICE_ITEM_CREATED: Triggered when a new invoice item is created.
    VAULT_CONNECTION_CREATED: Triggered when a new vault connection is created.
    VAULT_CONNECTION_UPDATED:
        Triggered when an existing vault connection is updated.
    VAULT_CONNECTION_DISABLED: Triggered when a vault connection is disabled.
    VAULT_CONNECTION_DELETED: Triggered when a vault connection is deleted.
    VAULT_CONNECTION_CALLABLE:
        Triggered when a vault connection becomes callable aka authorized.
    VAULT_CONNECTION_REVOKED: Triggered when a vault connection is revoked.
    VAULT_CONNECTION_TOKEN_REFRESH_FAILED:
        Triggered when token refresh fails for a vault connection.

external_id.title: External Id
external_id.description: Unique identifier for the credit note in the external system.

date.title: Date
date.description: Date when the credit note was issued or created.

status.title: Status
status.description: Current state of the credit note in its lifecycle.

description.title: Description
description.description: Brief explanation or reason for issuing the credit note.

total_amount.title: Total Amount
total_amount.description: Total monetary value of the credit note, including all items and taxes.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Indicates whether this credit note is associated with a marketplace transaction.

tax_amount_imported.title: Tax Amount Imported
tax_amount_imported.description: Pre-calculated total tax amount for the entire credit note, if provided by the external system.

tax_rate_imported.title: Tax Rate Imported
tax_rate_imported.description: Pre-calculated overall tax rate for the credit note, if provided by the external system.

taxable_amount.title: Taxable Amount
taxable_amount.description: Total portion of the credit note amount subject to taxation.

currency.description: The currency used for all amounts in this credit note.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: A list of TransactionAddressBuilder objects or None if no addresses are provided. This field represents the addresses associated with the transaction.

transaction_items.title: Transaction Items
transaction_items.description: Detailed list of individual items included in this credit note.

external_id.title: External Id
external_id.description: Unique identifier for the credit note item in the external system.

date.title: Date
date.description: Date when the credit note item was issued or created.

description.title: Description
description.description: Brief explanation or details about the credit note item.

external_product_id.title: External Product Id
external_product_id.description: Unique identifier for the associated product in the external system.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Number of units or amount of the product being credited.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total monetary value of the credit note item before taxes.

tax_amount_imported.title: Tax Amount Imported
tax_amount_imported.description: Pre-calculated tax amount for the item, if provided by the external system.

tax_rate_imported.title: Tax Rate Imported
tax_rate_imported.description: Pre-calculated tax rate for the item, if provided by the external system.

taxable_amount.title: Taxable Amount
taxable_amount.description: Portion of the item amount subject to taxation.

tax_exemption.description: Specific tax exemption status applied to this item, if any.

tax_items.title: Tax Items
tax_items.description: Detailed breakdown of individual tax components applied to this item.

creditNoteCode.title: Creditnotecode
creditNoteCode.description: The unique identifier of the credit note in Chargebee.

invoiceCode.title: Invoicecode
invoiceCode.description: The unique identifier of the invoice in Chargebee to which this credit note belongs.

creditNoteType.description: Whether the credit note was created for the full amount on the invoice or only for a part of the invoice amount.

documentDateTime.title: Documentdatetime
documentDateTime.description: The date and time at which the credit note was created in Chargebee. For example, if the value is 2022-10-28T15:36:28.129+05:30, then the timestamp represents October 28, 2022, at 15:36:28.129, with an offset of +05:30. This means that the time represented is 5 hours and 30 minutes ahead of UTC/GMT. In the case of a merchant site located in UTC, these datatypes would send a timestamp in the format 2022-11-11T15:40:44.65Z. This timestamp represents November 11, 2022, at 15:40:44.65, with the 'Z' indicating that the time is in UTC.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency in the ISO-4217 format.

seller.description: The details of the seller involved in the transaction including company code and address.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total amount of the credit note. total can be expressed as exemptAmount + taxableAmount + taxAmount.

discountAmount.title: Discountamount
discountAmount.description: The total discount applied. This is the sum of all lineItems.discount.

taxableAmount.title: Taxableamount
taxableAmount.description: The amount upon which the tax is calculated.

taxAmount.title: Taxamount
taxAmount.description: The total tax payable. This is the sum of all lineItems.taxAmount.

roundingAmount.title: Roundingamount
roundingAmount.description: The rounding amount added to the total amount to account for fractional correction.

lineItems.title: Lineitems
lineItems.description: The details of a line item.

CreditNoteRequest.title: CreditNoteRequest
CreditNoteRequest.description:
The details of a credit note sent to the Tax Service Adapter by Chargebee.
A credit note is used to reduce the amount due on an invoice.
If the credit note is issued after payments have been made for the invoice, refunds
can be issued to the Customer.

enum.description: Software as a Service designed for business-to-business interactions.
enum.example: Enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems.

enum.description: Software as a Service aimed at consumers.
enum.example: Personal finance management tools.

enum.description: Software applications provided to businesses over a network, hosted on servers not located at the customer's premises.
enum.example: Salesforce (CRM), Microsoft 365 (Business), Google Workspace, SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Workday
enum.subcategory: Hosted Software with Server Off-Premise B2B

enum.description: Software applications provided to individual consumers over a network, hosted on servers not located at the consumer's premises.
enum.example: Streaming services (Netflix/Spotify software), Online games (cloud-hosted), Personal cloud storage apps, Web-based email clients, Freemium SaaS (consumer)
enum.subcategory: Hosted Software with Server Off-Premise B2C

enum.description: Charges billed to a business specifically for initial installation, configuration, or setup of an ASP or hosted software service.
enum.example: SaaS onboarding fee, Hosted software setup charge, ASP configuration fee, Cloud application deployment fee, Initial user setup (ASP)
enum.subcategory: Installation/Setup Fees for Hosted Software B2B

enum.description: Charges billed to an individual consumer specifically for initial installation, configuration, or setup of an ASP or hosted software service.
enum.example: Consumer SaaS setup fee, Hosted game installation charge, Personal cloud setup assistance, Streaming service activation fee, Online app configuration support
enum.subcategory: Installation/Setup Fees for Hosted Software B2C

enum.description: Infrastructure as a Service for businesses, offering virtualized computing resources like virtual machines, storage, and networks.
enum.example: AWS EC2 instances (business), Azure Virtual Machines (B2B), Google Compute Engine (enterprise), Cloud storage (business tier), Dedicated hosting (IaaS)

enum.description: Infrastructure as a Service for individual consumers, offering access to fundamental computing resources like virtual servers or storage.
enum.example: Personal cloud servers (VPS), Consumer cloud storage, Hobbyist virtual machines, Developer sandbox (IaaS), Personal VPN (self-hosted IaaS)

enum.description: Platform as a Service for businesses, offering a platform for developing, running, and managing applications without managing infrastructure.
enum.example: AWS Elastic Beanstalk (business), Azure App Service (B2B), Google App Engine (enterprise), Heroku (professional tier), Salesforce Platform

enum.description: Platform as a Service for individual consumers/developers, offering a platform for creating, deploying, and managing personal applications.
enum.example: Free/hobbyist PaaS tiers, Developer PaaS (individual accounts), App building platforms (consumer), Cloud development environments (personal), Serverless functions (personal use)

enum.description: A service model where digital data is stored on third-party servers and accessed via a network like the internet.
enum.example: Dropbox, Google Drive, iCloud, OneDrive, Amazon S3 (personal/business)

enum.description: Pre-existing software installed by a vendor directly onto an individual consumer's device, where the vendor does not provide ongoing hosting.
enum.example: Home productivity software (installed by tech), Anti-virus setup (on-site), Game installation service (local), Educational software (vendor installed), OS installation (by technician)

enum.description: Pre-existing software acquired by individual consumers via electronic download for installation on their personal devices.
enum.example: Downloaded games, Productivity apps (download), Utility software (ESD), Mobile apps (purchased/downloaded), Creative software (download license)

enum.description: Pre-existing software delivered to individual consumers on tangible storage media like CDs, DVDs, or USB drives.
enum.example: Games on DVD, OS on USB drive, Productivity suite (CD-ROM), Educational software (boxed), Tax software (physical media)

enum.description: Pre-existing software for educational purposes, licensed and delivered to educational institutions or businesses via electronic download.
enum.example: Learning Management Systems (LMS downloaded), Classroom software (institutional download), Training simulation software (B2B ESD), Educational game licenses (bulk download), K-12 curriculum software (download)

enum.description: General-purpose or business-specific pre-existing software (not primarily educational) licensed and delivered to businesses via electronic download.
enum.example: Office productivity suites (B2B download), Accounting software (download license), CRM software (downloaded), Design software (B2B ESD), Project management tools (download)

enum.description: Computer programs and associated documentation designed for and licensed to businesses for various operational or productivity functions.
enum.example: ERP systems, CRM software, Business analytics tools, Accounting software, Project management software

enum.description: Computer programs and associated documentation designed for and licensed to individual consumers for personal use, entertainment, or productivity.
enum.example: Video games, Personal productivity apps, Antivirus software (consumer), Photo editing software (personal), Mobile apps (consumer)

enum.description: Pre-existing software installed by a vendor directly onto a business customer's hardware, where the vendor does not provide ongoing hosting.
enum.example: On-premise ERP installation, Vendor-installed accounting software, Local server application setup, Desktop productivity suite (on-site install), Machine-specific control software

enum.description: Pre-existing software acquired by businesses through electronic download, for installation on their own systems.
enum.example: Microsoft Office (volume license download), Adobe Creative Suite (B2B download), Accounting software (ESD), CAD software (download), Server software licenses (downloaded)

enum.description: Pre-existing software delivered to businesses on tangible storage media such as CDs, DVDs, or USB drives.
enum.example: ERP software (on DVD), CAD/CAM on USB, Boxed office suites, Industry-specific software (CD), Archived software (physical)

enum.description: Software designed to operate and manage computer hardware and provide a platform for running application software.
enum.example: Operating systems (Windows/macOS/Linux), Device drivers, Utility programs, Firmware, Boot loaders

enum.description: Granting permission or providing means to use a computer workstation, often for a specified period or purpose, including shared/public computers.
enum.example: Internet cafe access, Library computer use, Co-working space hot desk, Kiosk computer session, Pay-per-use terminal

enum.description: Unique software for specific business needs, installed directly onto client's hardware by vendor, without ongoing vendor hosting.
enum.example: Bespoke on-premise ERP, Custom local database app, Tailored B2B desktop tool, Vendor-installed proprietary software, Client-server custom application

enum.description: Unique software for specific business needs, delivered to client via electronic download for installation on their systems.
enum.example: Bespoke CRM (downloaded), Custom ERP modules (ESD), Tailored B2B app (download), Proprietary analysis tool (download), Custom e-commerce platform (client-hosted)

enum.description: Unique software for specific business needs, delivered to client on tangible storage media like CDs, DVDs, or USB drives.
enum.example: Bespoke software on CD (B2B), Custom application (USB delivery), Tailored ERP system (physical media), Proprietary tool (on DVD for business), Custom database app (physical install media)

enum.description: Services to alter or add features to existing prewritten software to meet specific user requirements, without changing core code.
enum.example: Configuring modules, Setting user parameters, Creating report templates, Scripting for integration, Workflow adjustments (COTS)

enum.description: Services for businesses involving automated or manual processing of data, where the results or output are delivered electronically.
enum.example: Electronic payroll processing, B2B data analysis reports (digital), Digital claims processing, E-statements, Cloud data transformation services

enum.description: Services provided to businesses involving the collection, manipulation, computation, or organization of data, often automated.
enum.example: B2B payroll processing, Claims processing services, Business data entry, Market research data analysis, Batch data conversion (B2B)

enum.description: Charges incurred by businesses for the right to access or retrieve information from databases, platforms, or information services.
enum.example: Database subscription fees (B2B), API access charges, Financial data feed fees, Legal research platform access, Market intelligence report access

enum.description: Charges incurred by individual consumers for the right to access information from online databases, content platforms, or specialized services.
enum.example: Premium content subscription, Online archive access fees, Genealogy database access, Consumer credit report fees, Pay-per-view data services

enum.description: Services involving manipulation or computation of data where final results are delivered in a digital or electronic format.
enum.example: Digital report, E-statement processing, Online data analysis, Cloud data transformation, Electronic data interchange (EDI)

enum.description: Services involving manipulation or computation of data where final results are delivered in a tangible, physical format.
enum.example: Printed report, Direct mail processing, Check printing services, Physical document archiving, Label printing services

enum.description: The collection and manipulation of items of data to produce meaningful information, a general term covering various computation or data organization tasks.
enum.example: Data entry, Data conversion, Information processing, Reports, Statistical analysis

enum.description: Recordings of books being read aloud, distributed and consumed in digital formats such as MP3 or proprietary app-based files.
enum.example: Audible audiobooks, MP3 audiobooks, Digital book narrations, Downloadable audiobooks, Streaming audiobooks

enum.description: Elective ongoing electronic delivery of software updates and version upgrades for custom-developed software, purchased separately (no other support).
enum.example: Optional custom SW upgrades (ESD), Elective version enhancements (download), Add-on patch service (custom electronic), A la carte custom software updates, Separately purchased upgrade-only plan
enum.subcategory: Custom Software Support - Optional - Electronic Updates/Upgrades Only

enum.description: Elective ongoing software updates/upgrades for custom software (installed on client hardware), purchased separately (no other support).
enum.example: Optional custom SW upgrades (on-prem), Elective version enhancements (local install), Add-on patch service (custom local), A la carte custom software updates (load & leave), Separately purchased upgrade-only plan (local)
enum.subcategory: Custom Software Support - Optional - Load & Leave Updates/Upgrades Only

enum.description: Elective ongoing delivery of software updates and version upgrades for custom-developed software, purchased separately (no other support services).
enum.example: Optional custom SW upgrades, Elective version enhancements, Add-on patch service (custom), A la carte custom software updates, Separately purchased upgrade-only plan (custom)
enum.subcategory: Custom Software Support - Optional - Updates/Upgrades Only

enum.description: Elective ongoing software updates/upgrades for prewritten software (installed on client hardware by vendor), purchased separately (no other support).
enum.example: Optional COTS upgrades (on-prem), Elective version enhancements (local install), Add-on patch service (local COTS), A la carte prewritten software updates (load & leave), Separately purchased upgrade-only plan (local)
enum.subcategory: Canned Software Support - Optional - Load & Leave Updates/Upgrades Only

enum.description: An elective service contract for future repair or maintenance of Tangible Personal Property (excluding software), purchased with the TPP.
enum.example: Extended hardware warranty, Appliance service plan, Equipment maintenance contract, Furniture protection plan, Vehicle service agreement (optional)
enum.subcategory: Optional Maintenance Agreement with TPP Sales

enum.description: Any Digital good outside of Kintsugi's defined categories
enum.example: Any Digital good outside of Kintsugi's defined categories

enum.description: Reductions from the usual price of goods or services, offered for various reasons like promotions or volume purchases.
enum.example: Percentage off, Fixed amount off, Buy-one-get-one, Seasonal sale, Clearance discount

enum.description: Price reductions achieved by customers redeeming accumulated points or credits earned through a customer loyalty program.
enum.example: Points redemption, Rewards cash-back, Frequent buyer discount, Tiered loyalty savings, Gamified rewards

enum.description: A price reduction by a retailer for customer paying an invoice early, applied after the initial point of sale.
enum.example: 2/10 net 30 terms, Prompt payment discount, Early settlement discount, Invoice credit (early pay), Account balance reduction
enum.subcategory: Discounts - Cash (Retailer Early Payment, After POS)

enum.description: A price reduction by a retailer at point of sale if customer makes immediate cash payment or meets other early payment conditions.
enum.example: Immediate payment discount, Upfront cash reduction, Pay-now-save offer, POS early settlement, Instant cash rebate
enum.subcategory: Discounts - Cash (Retailer Early Payment, At POS)

enum.description: A price reduction offered by a retailer to customers who pay with cash instead of credit card or other non-cash methods.
enum.example: Cash discount (at gas station), Pay-by-cash savings, Surcharge avoidance (cash), Dual pricing (cash lower), Cash-only price

enum.description: Reductions from the usual price specifically applied to Tangible Personal Property (TPP).
enum.example: Discount on goods, Price cut (merchandise), Sale on items, Reduced price (products), Special offer (tangibles)

enum.description: A partial refund by a product's manufacturer to customers after purchase, where the initial item sale was taxable.
enum.example: Mail-in rebate, Instant rebate (manufacturer), Cashback offer (mfr.), Product registration rebate, Loyalty rebate (mfr.)

enum.description: Cards issued by retailers or organizations entitling the holder to discounts on goods or services upon presentation.
enum.example: Loyalty cards (discount type), Store membership cards, Association discount cards, Senior discount cards, Student discount cards

enum.description: Bound collections of vouchers or certificates offering discounts, special deals, or free goods/services from various businesses.
enum.example: Entertainment Book, Local coupon books, Restaurant discount books, Travel coupon books, Fundraiser coupon books

enum.description: Monetary value stored in a digital format (e.g., email, mobile app) usable as payment for goods/services, delivered via electronic means.
enum.example: E-gift cards, Digital gift vouchers, Mobile gift cards, Email gift certificates, Virtual gift cards

enum.description: Shipping Charges separately stated, where the possession of goods get transferred at the time of Sales
enum.example: Shipping Charges separately stated, where the possession of goods get transferred at the time of Sales
enum.subcategory: Shipping - Title transfer at time of Sales

enum.description: Shipping Charges separately stated, where the possession of goods get transferred at customer location after possession
enum.example: Shipping Charges separately stated, where the possession of goods get transferred at customer location after possession
enum.subcategory: Shipping - Title transfer after Customer Possession

enum.description: Shipping and Handling charges combined
enum.example: Shipping and Handling charges combined

enum.description: Fees levied by credit card companies for various services.
enum.example: Annual fees, late payment fees.

enum.description: Banking fees or Financial Transaction Fees
enum.example: OD Fees, Cheque Book Fees

enum.description: Exempt Products & Services
enum.example: Exempt Products & Services

enum.description: Any physical good outside of Kintsugi's defined categories
enum.example: Barbells and dumbbells.

enum.description: Medicines Sold OTC, which do not require doctors prescription
enum.example: Paracetamol, Ointments for Pain Relief, Gastro Relief Gel

enum.description: Common items of everyday wearing apparel designed for human use, covering a wide variety of non-specialized garments.
enum.example: T-shirts, Jeans, Dresses, Socks, Underwear

enum.description: Protective overgarments worn to shield clothing during domestic tasks such as cooking, cleaning, or crafting.
enum.example: Kitchen aprons, Bib aprons, Cleaning aprons, Craft aprons, Garden aprons

enum.description: Undergarments specifically designed to provide support and protection for the male genitalia during sports or physical activity.
enum.example: Jockstraps, Support briefs, Cup supporters, Dance belts, Groin guards

enum.description: Square or triangular pieces of cloth, often patterned, worn on the head, around the neck, or face for practical or decorative use.
enum.example: Paisley bandanas, Cotton bandanas, Silk headscarves, Neckerchiefs, Tube bandanas

enum.description: Garments designed for wear during water-based activities like swimming or sunbathing, and associated headwear.
enum.example: Bikinis, One-piece suits, Swim trunks, Rash guards, Swim caps

enum.description: Accessories worn to secure or hold up garments, particularly trousers, belts encircle the waist, suspenders use shoulder straps.
enum.example: Leather belts, Fabric belts, Elastic suspenders, Clip-on suspenders, Button suspenders

enum.description: Garments worn hanging from the neck over the chest to protect clothing from spills, primarily for infants or during messy activities.
enum.example: Baby bibs, Toddler bibs, Silicone bibs, Drool bibs, Adult lobster bibs

enum.description: Footwear covering the foot and ankle, and often part of the lower leg, for various uses and conditions.
enum.example: Ankle boots, Chelsea boots, Cowboy boots, Hiking boots, Winter boots

enum.description: Outer garments for the upper body providing warmth or protection from weather, coats are generally longer or heavier than jackets.
enum.example: Trench coats, Parkas, Blazers, Denim jackets, Winter coats

enum.description: One-piece garments that cover the torso, arms, and legs, typically worn over other clothes for protection during work or specialized activities.
enum.example: Work coveralls, Disposable coveralls, Boiler suits, Flight suits, Insulated coveralls

enum.description: Absorbent pads worn under clothing in the armpit area to protect garments from perspiration stains and odor.
enum.example: Disposable shields, Sew-in shields, Cotton shields, Underarm pads, Sweat guards

enum.description: Accessories consisting of two soft pads connected by a band, worn over the ears for warmth or noise protection.
enum.example: Winter earmuffs, Fleece earmuffs, Fashion earmuffs, Noise-reduction muffs, Adjustable earmuffs

enum.description: Very short, sock-like foot coverings designed to be invisible or barely visible when worn with low-cut shoes.
enum.example: No-show socks, Liner socks, Peds, Invisible socks, Shoe liners

enum.description: Apparel suitable for highly formal occasions, such as tuxedos or tailcoats for men, and evening or ball gowns for women.
enum.example: Tuxedos, Evening gowns, Ball gowns, Morning suits, White tie attire

enum.description: Waterproof overshoes, typically made of rubber, worn over regular shoes to protect them from rain, snow, or mud.
enum.example: Rubber overshoes, Snow boots (pull-on), Waterproof shoe covers, Mud boots, Storm wellingtons

enum.description: Undergarments used to hold up stockings or socks, garters are individual bands, while garter belts are waistbands with suspender straps.
enum.example: Lace garter belts, Satin garters, Bridal garters, Suspender belts, Leg garters

enum.description: Form-fitting undergarments designed to shape or support the waist, hips, and abdomen, typically made of elasticized fabric.
enum.example: Shaping girdles, Support girdles, Posture girdles, Panty girdles, Open-bottom girdles

enum.description: Hand coverings made from woven or knitted fabric, providing light protection, warmth, or for fashion purposes in everyday situations.
enum.example: Cotton gloves, Jersey gloves, Knitted gloves, Parade gloves, Liner gloves

enum.description: Hand coverings made from tanned animal hides, offering durability, abrasion resistance, and often a stylish appearance for everyday wear.
enum.example: Driving gloves, Dress gloves, Casual leather gloves, Unlined leather gloves, Winter leather gloves

enum.description: Small hand coverings designed for children, made from various materials (cloth, wool, synthetic) for warmth, play, or basic protection.
enum.example: Children's mittens, Kids' winter gloves, Toddler play gloves, Fleece gloves (child), Knitted mittens (child)

enum.description: Hand coverings made from sheepskin with the wool intact, prized for exceptional softness, warmth, and breathability for everyday wear.
enum.example: Sheepskin mittens, Shearling gloves, Fleece-lined sheepskin gloves, Winter sheepskin gloves, Driving gloves (sheepskin)

enum.description: Hand coverings made from or lined with animal fur, providing significant warmth and a luxurious appearance for general, non-specialized wear.
enum.example: Mink fur gloves, Fox fur trimmed gloves, Rabbit fur mittens, Beaver fur gauntlets, Rex rabbit gloves

enum.description: Waterproof hand coverings made from natural or synthetic rubber, designed for light protection during household tasks or general non-industrial activities.
enum.example: Household cleaning gloves, Dishwashing gloves, Light gardening gloves, Latex gloves (non-medical), Nitrile gloves (non-medical)

enum.description: Apparel specifically designed for playing golf, emphasizing comfort, freedom of movement, and often moisture-wicking or weather-resistant properties.
enum.example: Golf shirts (polos), Golf trousers/shorts, Golf sweaters/vests, Golf skirts/skorts, Golf windbreakers

enum.description: Head coverings worn for various purposes including protection from weather, fashion, religious reasons, or as part of an informal uniform.
enum.example: Baseball caps, Beanies, Fedoras, Sun hats, Berets

enum.description: Knitted garments worn directly on the feet and legs, including items like stockings, pantyhose, tights, and various lengths of socks.

enum.example: attached equipment servicing, building-mounted machinery maintenance, facility equipment service contracts, installed equipment maintenance, attached property servicing

enum.description: Maintenance and repair services for movable equipment and tangible personal property in commercial and industrial facilities.
enum.example: movable equipment maintenance, personal property repairs, machinery service work, equipment maintenance contracts, portable equipment servicing
enum.subcategory: Movable Personal Property Equipment Maintenance Services

enum.description: Maintenance and repair services performed directly on real estate, building structures, and permanent property improvements. Real property services often exempt from sales tax.
enum.example: building structural maintenance, real estate repair services, property maintenance work, structural building repairs, real property upkeep
enum.subcategory: Real Property Building Structure Maintenance Services

enum.description: Cable television programming services including digital cable packages, channel programming, and cable TV installation services. Utility services generally subject to sales tax.
enum.example: Cable Tv Programming, Digital Cable Services, Television Channel Packages, Cable Installation Services, Cable Television Subscriptions

enum.description: Administrative fees charged for cancelling services, reservations, contracts, or booking arrangements. Fee taxability depends on the underlying service or transaction.
enum.example: service cancellation penalties, booking cancellation fees, contract termination charges, reservation cancellation costs, administrative cancellation fees
enum.subcategory: Service Cancellation and Administrative Fee Charges

enum.description: Decorative and functional candles including scented varieties, along with related accessories like holders, trimmers, and candle-making supplies. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: Scented Decorative Candles, Pillar Candle Products, Candle Holder Accessories, Wick Trimming Tools, Candle Warmer Devices
enum.subcategory: Decorative Candles and Candle Accessory Products

enum.description: Chewing gum and candy products containing vitamins, minerals, or dietary supplements with required supplement facts labeling. May be classified as dietary supplements for tax purposes.
enum.example: vitamin-enriched gummies, supplement chewing gum, nutritional candy products, fortified confectionery, functional sweet treats
enum.subcategory: Chewing gum or Candy Nutritional Supplement Label

enum.description: General-purpose cleaning supplies and solutions for household, office, and commercial cleaning applications. Typically taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: all-purpose cleaning solutions, household detergents, commercial disinfectants, floor cleaning products, glass cleaning solutions
enum.subcategory: Household and Commercial Cleaning Supply Products

enum.description: Over-the-counter medicated cleansing products for facial care, acne treatment, and therapeutic skin cleansing available at retail. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: medicated acne cleansers, therapeutic facial washes, over-counter skin treatment, medicated cleansing products, retail skin care cleansers

enum.description: Prescription medicated cleansing products for treating specific dermatological conditions and skin disorders under medical supervision. May be exempt when sold by prescription.
enum.example: prescription dermatology cleansers, therapeutic skin treatment products, medicated prescription face wash, clinical skin cleansing products, dermatologist-prescribed cleansers

enum.description: Computer hardware, equipment, and technology systems designed for business, commercial, and enterprise applications. Generally taxable but may qualify for resale exemptions.
enum.example: business server systems, commercial computer equipment, enterprise hardware solutions, office computer systems, professional IT hardware
enum.subcategory: Business Computer Hardware and Equipment Systems

enum.description: Computer hardware, devices, and electronic equipment designed for personal, home, and individual consumer use. Typically taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: personal desktop computers, consumer laptop systems, home computer accessories, individual electronic devices, personal computing hardware

enum.description: Prescription eyeglasses and corrective lenses dispensed by licensed ophthalmologists for vision correction and eye care. Often exempt from sales tax when prescribed.
enum.example: prescription eyeglasses, corrective vision lenses, ophthalmologist-dispensed eyewear, medical prescription glasses, corrective optical devices
enum.subcategory: Prescription Corrective Eyewear from Licensed Ophthalmologists

enum.description: Non-prescription eyeglasses, reading aids, and vision enhancement products sold by eye care professionals. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: Reading Glasses, Magnifying Glasses, Non-prescription Eyewear, Vision Aid Products, Over-counter Optical Aids

enum.description: Credit card and electronic payment processing services including transaction fees charged by merchants for payment handling. Service fees generally subject to sales tax.
enum.example: credit card processing fees, merchant transaction charges, electronic payment services, payment gateway fees, card processing costs
enum.subcategory: Merchant Credit Card Payment Processing Services

enum.description: Credit reporting, monitoring, and analysis services provided by credit bureaus and financial reporting agencies. Business services may be subject to sales tax in some states.
enum.example: credit score monitoring, credit report services, financial credit analysis, credit bureau reporting, credit assessment services
enum.subcategory: Credit Bureau Reporting and Monitoring Services

enum.description: Medical and therapeutic cushions for patient positioning, pressure relief, comfort enhancement, and clinical support applications. Medical equipment may qualify for exemptions.
enum.example: therapeutic seat cushions, medical positioning aids, pressure relief cushions, patient comfort products, clinical support cushions

enum.description: Antiseptic mouthwash and oral rinse products containing active ingredients for oral hygiene and bacterial reduction. May be classified as medical products.
enum.example: antiseptic mouthwash solutions, therapeutic oral rinses, antimicrobial mouth rinses, medicated oral hygiene products, antiseptic dental rinses

enum.description: Portable breath spray products for oral hygiene maintenance and breath freshening without therapeutic medicinal claims. Generally taxable as personal care products.
enum.example: breath freshening sprays, oral hygiene sprays, portable mouth sprays, instant breath fresheners, oral freshening products
enum.subcategory: Breath Freshening Oral Care Spray Products

enum.description: Medicated mouthwash products with drug facts panel containing active ingredients for therapeutic oral care and treatment. Medical products may be exempt in some cases.
enum.example: therapeutic mouthwash products, medicated oral rinses, fluoride treatment rinses, prescription-strength mouthwash, clinical oral care products
enum.subcategory: Medicated Oral Care Products with Drug Facts Panel

enum.description: Electronic video games and gaming software distributed on physical storage media such as discs, cartridges, or memory cards. Taxable as tangible personal property due to physical media.
enum.example: gaming console discs, video game cartridges, PC game DVDs, physical gaming media, tangible game products
enum.subcategory: Video Games Distributed on Physical Media

enum.description: Video games and gaming content delivered through digital download platforms, streaming services, or cloud-based gaming systems. Digital product taxability varies significantly by state.
enum.example: downloadable video games, game streaming services, digital gaming content, online game downloads, cloud gaming subscriptions
enum.subcategory: Digital Gaming Content and Streaming Services

enum.description: Educational services including teaching, training, tutoring, and instructional programs for academic and professional development. Educational services often exempt from sales tax.
enum.example: Tutoring Services, Educational Training Programs, Academic Instruction, Learning Services, Professional Education Courses

enum.description: Professional engineering services including technical consultation, design analysis, project engineering, and specialized engineering expertise. Professional services often exempt from sales tax.
enum.example: structural engineering consultation, technical engineering services, engineering design analysis, professional engineering advice, specialized engineering solutions
enum.subcategory: Professional Engineering Consulting and Design Services

enum.description: Professional flooring installation services specifically for commercial properties, offices, retail spaces, and business facilities. Installation services may be taxable separately from materials.
enum.example: commercial flooring installation, business property flooring, office floor installation, retail space flooring, commercial floor services

enum.description: Professional flooring installation services for residential properties including homes, apartments, and personal living spaces. Installation services taxability varies by jurisdiction.
enum.example: home flooring installation, residential floor services, house flooring work, apartment floor installation, residential flooring contractors

enum.description: Digitally downloaded video games with permanent ownership rights, offline access, and full game content without subscription requirements. Digital product taxability varies by state.
enum.example: permanently owned digital games, full game downloads, digital game purchases, owned electronic games, permanent digital gaming content
enum.subcategory: Purchased Digital Games with Permanent Ownership Rights

enum.description: Video games accessed through subscription services, streaming platforms, or temporary downloads with limited ownership and access rights. Subscription service taxability varies.
enum.example: gaming subscription services, game streaming access, temporary game downloads, subscription gaming platforms, limited-access digital games

enum.description: Professional gift wrapping and package decoration services for presents and special occasion items. Service taxability depends on state and whether bundled with product sales.
enum.example: Gift Wrapping Services, Present Packaging, Special Occasion Wrapping, Holiday Gift Preparation, Decorative Package Services

enum.description: Stand-alone gift wrapping services provided independently without connection to tangible personal property sales. Independent services may be subject to sales tax.
enum.example: Independent Gift Wrapping, Standalone Wrapping Services, Separate Gift Packaging, Custom Wrapping Services, Professional Gift Preparation

enum.description: Optional gift wrapping services offered in conjunction with and associated with tangible personal property purchases. May be considered part of the retail sale.
enum.example: Optional Retail Gift Wrapping, Purchase-associated Wrapping, Add-on Gift Services, Retail Gift Packaging, Complementary Wrapping Services
enum.subcategory: Optional Gift Wrapping Services for Product Purchases

enum.description: Glass containers, drinking vessels, dishes, and decorative glass items for household and commercial use. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: glass drinking vessels, glass dish sets, decorative glassware, glass storage containers, crystal glass products
enum.subcategory: Glass Products and Decorative Glassware Items

enum.description: Professional visual design services including logo creation, marketing materials, branding, and graphic communication design. Professional services may be exempt from sales tax in some states.
enum.example: Logo Design Services, Branding Graphic Design, Marketing Material Design, Visual Communication Services, Professional Design Consultation
enum.subcategory: Professional Graphic Design and Visual Communication Services

enum.description: Hand-operated tools and implements for construction, repair, maintenance, and various trade applications. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: manual construction tools, hand repair implements, maintenance hand tools, carpentry hand tools, mechanical hand implements
enum.subcategory: Manual Hand Tools and Construction Implements

enum.description: General healthcare products, medical supplies, and health-related items for patient care and health maintenance. Medical supplies may qualify for exemptions in certain circumstances.
enum.example: medical supply products, healthcare equipment, patient care items, health maintenance supplies, general medical products
enum.subcategory: General Healthcare Products and Medical Supply Items

enum.description: Repair parts and replacement components for durable medical equipment designed specifically for single patient use and disposal. Medical equipment parts may qualify for tax exemptions.
enum.example: single-use medical parts, disposable DME components, patient-specific replacement parts, single-patient medical equipment parts, disposable medical device components
enum.subcategory: Single Patient Use DME Replacement Components

enum.description: Prescription medications and pharmaceutical drugs for human use requiring physician authorization and medical supervision. Prescription drugs are generally exempt from sales tax except in Illinois.
enum.example: prescription medication products, pharmaceutical drugs, prescribed therapeutic drugs, physician-authorized medications, prescription pharmaceutical preparations
enum.subcategory: Prescription Pharmaceutical Products for Human Use

enum.description: Non-prescription medications and pharmaceutical products for human use available without physician prescription. OTC drugs may be taxable or exempt depending on state.
enum.example: over-counter medications, non-prescription drugs, OTC pharmaceutical products, self-care medications, retail pharmaceutical items

enum.description: Prescription durable medical equipment designed for home healthcare use as prescribed by licensed healthcare providers. Prescription DME often exempt from sales tax.
enum.example: prescription home medical devices, home healthcare DME, prescribed medical equipment, home-use medical apparatus, therapeutic home equipment
enum.subcategory: Prescription Home Use Durable Medical Equipment

enum.description: Durable medical equipment for home healthcare use available without prescription for personal health management. Non-prescription DME may be taxable in some states.
enum.example: non-prescription home medical devices, over-counter medical equipment, home healthcare products, personal medical aids, consumer medical devices
enum.subcategory: Non-Prescription Home Use Durable Medical Equipment

enum.description: Professional landscape design, installation, and maintenance services for outdoor spaces and grounds management. Service taxability varies by state and type of property.
enum.example: Landscape Design Services, Garden Maintenance Work, Grounds Keeping Services, Outdoor Space Development, Landscaping Consultation
enum.subcategory: Professional Landscaping and Grounds Maintenance Services

enum.description: Traditional face-to-face legal services including consultation, representation, and legal advice provided in person. Legal services are generally exempt from sales tax.
enum.example: in-person legal consultation, traditional attorney services, face-to-face legal advice, personal legal representation, conventional legal services
enum.subcategory: In Person Legal Consultation and Representation Services

enum.description: Online and digital legal services including virtual consultation, electronic document preparation, and remote legal assistance. Online legal services typically follow same exemption rules as traditional legal services.
enum.example: online legal consultation, virtual attorney services, digital legal advice, remote legal assistance, electronic legal services
enum.subcategory: Online Legal Services and Digital Legal Consultation

enum.description: Professional marketing, advertising, promotional, and business development services for commercial clients. Business services may be subject to sales tax in some jurisdictions.
enum.example: Marketing Consultation Services, Advertising Campaign Development, Promotional Strategy Services, Business Marketing Solutions, Commercial Advertising Services

enum.description: General disposable medical supplies including patches, pads, and single-use medical items for healthcare applications. Medical supplies may be exempt when used for medical purposes.
enum.example: disposable medical patches, medical gauze pads, single-use medical supplies, healthcare disposable items, medical patch products

enum.description: Physical membership cards and discount programs providing access to benefits, reduced pricing, and exclusive offers. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: membership discount cards, loyalty program cards, benefit access cards, savings membership programs, discount club cards
enum.subcategory: Membership Programs and Discount Card Services

enum.description: General office supplies, stationery, and business materials for administrative and office operations. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: office stationery supplies, business paper products, office writing materials, administrative supplies, workplace office materials
enum.subcategory: Business Office Supplies and Administrative Materials

enum.description: Various digital goods, electronic content, and digital products delivered without physical media or storage devices. Digital product taxability varies significantly by state.
enum.example: digital content downloads, electronic product delivery, digital media content, online digital products, electronic content services
enum.subcategory: Digital Content and Electronic Product Delivery Services

enum.description: Packaging materials, containers, and shipping supplies for product protection, storage, and transportation. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: shipping packaging materials, product storage containers, protective packaging supplies, mailing materials, transportation packaging
enum.subcategory: Packaging Supplies and Shipping Material Products

enum.description: Professional packaging service - prepare customer goods (purchased elsewhere) for transport - does not include packing materials product
enum.example: Professional Packaging Services
enum.subcategory: Packaging Services for Goods Puschased Elsewhere

enum.description: Professional payroll management, processing, and administration services including wage calculation and payment processing. Business services may be taxable in some states.
enum.example: Payroll Processing Services, Wage Administration, Employee Pay Services, Payroll Management Solutions, Salary Processing Services
enum.subcategory: Professional Payroll Processing and Administration Services

enum.description: Personal fitness training, coaching, and individual exercise instruction services for health and physical conditioning. Personal services may be subject to sales tax in some jurisdictions.
enum.example: personal fitness training, individual exercise coaching, fitness instruction services, personal workout training, health coaching services
enum.subcategory: Individual Fitness Training and Personal Coaching Services

enum.description: Repair services for tangible personal property performed under commercial maintenance contracts excluding residential services. Commercial repair services generally subject to sales tax.
enum.example: commercial equipment repairs, business machinery service, commercial maintenance contracts, industrial equipment repair, business equipment servicing

enum.description: Repair services for tangible personal property performed under residential maintenance or home service contracts. Residential repair services may have different tax treatment.
enum.example: residential appliance repair, home equipment service, household machinery repair, residential maintenance contracts, home appliance servicing

enum.description: Repair parts, components, and replacement pieces for manufacturing machinery and industrial equipment. Manufacturing equipment parts may qualify for exemptions in some states.
enum.example: manufacturing machinery parts, industrial equipment components, factory machine parts, production equipment replacements, machinery repair components
enum.subcategory: Industrial Manufacturing Equipment Parts and Components

enum.description: Real property repair and improvement services that constitute capital improvements and increase property value. Capital improvements to real property often exempt from sales tax.
enum.example: Property Capital Improvements, Building Renovation Services, Real Estate Enhancement, Property Value Improvements, Capital Building Projects

enum.description: Routine commercial real property maintenance and repair services that do not constitute capital improvements.
enum.example: commercial building maintenance, business property repairs, commercial facility upkeep, office building maintenance, commercial property servicing

enum.description: Residential real property repair and improvement services that constitute capital improvements to home value. Residential capital improvements may be exempt from sales tax.
enum.example: Home Improvement Projects, Residential Property Enhancements, House Renovation Services, Residential Capital Improvements, Home Value Improvements

enum.description: Routine residential real property maintenance and repair services that do not constitute capital improvements. Residential maintenance services may have varying tax treatment.
enum.example: Home Maintenance Services, Residential Property Repairs, House Maintenance Work, Residential Facility Upkeep, Home Repair Services

enum.description: Professional sales assistance, support, consulting, and business development services for commercial clients.
enum.example: sales consulting services, business development support, sales training services, commercial sales assistance, sales strategy consultation
enum.subcategory: Professional Sales Support and Business Development Services

enum.description: General service categories and miscellaneous service types not specifically classified in other service categories. General services may be subject to varying tax treatment.
enum.example: general business services, miscellaneous service work, various professional services, unspecified service categories, general support services

enum.description: Tool storage containers, toolboxes, and organization systems for storing and transporting tools and equipment. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: professional toolboxes, tool storage systems, equipment storage containers, tool organization solutions, portable tool storage
enum.subcategory: Tool Storage and Organization Equipment Systems

enum.description: General tools, implements, and equipment for construction, maintenance, repair, and various professional applications. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: professional construction tools, maintenance equipment, repair implements, trade tools, work equipment
enum.subcategory: Professional Tools and Work Implementation Equipment

enum.description: Absorbent textile towel products for personal hygiene, household cleaning, and drying applications. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: bath towel products, absorbent hand towels, household cleaning towels, personal hygiene towels, textile drying products

enum.description: Warehouse storage services for goods, inventory, and property held for future sale or commercial distribution.
enum.example: inventory warehousing services, commercial goods storage, retail inventory storage, merchandise warehousing, business product storage

enum.description: Warehouse storage services for personal property, household goods, and items not intended for commercial sale. Personal storage services may have different tax treatment.
enum.example: personal property storage, household goods warehousing, private storage services, personal item storage, non-commercial storage

enum.description: Specialized refrigerated and temperature-controlled warehouse storage services for perishable and temperature-sensitive goods.
enum.example: refrigerated storage services, cold storage warehousing, temperature-controlled storage, frozen goods storage, climate-controlled warehousing

enum.description: Optional extended warranty contracts and service agreements provided in association with tangible personal property purchases.
enum.example: extended warranty programs, product service contracts, optional warranty coverage, extended product protection, warranty service agreements
enum.subcategory: Optional Extended Warranty Services for Product Purchases

enum.description: Durable medical equipment designed for institutional and clinical use without prescription requirements. Institutional medical equipment may be subject to different tax treatment.
enum.example: institutional medical equipment, clinical healthcare devices, facility medical apparatus, non-prescription medical systems, healthcare facility equipment
enum.subcategory: Non Prescription Institutional Durable Medical Equipment

enum.description: Prescription durable medical equipment designed for institutional healthcare facilities and clinical environments.
enum.example: prescription clinical equipment, institutional medical devices, facility healthcare apparatus, prescription medical systems, clinical healthcare equipment

enum.description: Professional cloth diapers
enum.example: Cloth Diapers

enum.description: Professional diapers - adult - sold at retail product
enum.example: Diapers for Adults

enum.description: Personal care deodorant products for body odor control and freshness maintenance without antiperspirant properties. Generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: body deodorant sprays, natural deodorant products, odor-control body products, personal freshness products, non-antiperspirant deodorants

enum.description: Professional incontinent liners - sold at retail
enum.example: Incontinent Liners Sold At Retail

enum.description: Cosmetic astringent products for facial toning, pore minimizing, and skin refreshing without medicinal acne-fighting properties. Taxable as cosmetic products.
enum.example: facial toning astringents, pore-minimizing products, skin refreshing toners, cosmetic facial clarifiers, non-medicated astringent solutions
enum.subcategory: Non Medicated Cosmetic Astringent and Toning Products

enum.description: Cosmetic products containing active medicinal ingredients with therapeutic benefits for skin conditions and dermatological care. May be classified as medical products for tax purposes.
enum.example: medicated foundation products, therapeutic makeup items, acne-fighting cosmetics, treatment-based cosmetics, medicinal beauty products

enum.description: Non-medicated cosmetic products containing sun protection factor (SPF) for UV protection and skin care benefits. Generally taxable as cosmetic products.
enum.example: SPF foundation makeup, sunscreen-enhanced cosmetics, UV protection makeup, tinted sunscreen products, sun-protective beauty products
enum.subcategory: Non Medicated Cosmetics with Sunscreen Protection

enum.description: Professional exercise supplies
enum.example: Excerside Supplies

enum.description: Professional eyelashes
enum.example: Cosmetic Eyelashes Extension

enum.description: Fabric hair accessories and decorative bow products for personal styling and hair decoration. Generally taxable as tangible personal property and personal accessories.
enum.example: fabric hair accessories, decorative hair bows, textile hair ornaments, fashion hair clips, styling hair accessories
enum.subcategory: Fabric Hair Accessory and Decorative Bow Products

enum.description: Artistic works, creative art products, and original artistic creations for decoration, collection, or cultural purposes. Art works generally taxable as tangible personal property.
enum.example: original paintings, artistic sculptures, creative artwork, collectible art pieces, decorative art objects
enum.subcategory: Artistic Works and Creative Art Products

enum.description: Professional training programs, educational seminars, and skill development workshops for business and professional development.
enum.example: professional training programs, business seminars, skill development workshops, corporate training, educational workshops

enum.description: Reusable food service utensils, dining implements, and hospitality amenities for restaurants and food service establishments. Food service equipment generally taxable.
enum.example: reusable dining utensils, food service implements, restaurant flatware, hospitality amenities, commercial dining tools
enum.subcategory: Reusable Food Service Utensils and Amenity Products

enum.description: Disposable food service utensils, single-use dining implements, and disposable hospitality amenities for restaurants and events. Disposable items generally taxable.
enum.example: disposable dining utensils, single-use flatware, paper dining products, disposable food service, single-use amenities
enum.subcategory: Disposable Food Service Utensils and Amenity Products

enum.description: Periodicals or Magazines Annual Publication
enum.example: Periodicals or Magazines Annual Publication

enum.example: Periodicals or Magazines Quarterly Publication

enum.example: Periodicals or Magazines Weekly Publication

number.title: Number
number.description: Index or serial number of the line item.

itemCode.title: Itemcode
itemCode.description: The unique identifier (in Chargebee) of the product correspondingto the line item. If the line item corresponds to a one-off charge,then this identifier is not present.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the line item.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The quantity associated with this line item.

unitPrice.title: Unitprice
unitPrice.description: The unit price for this line item. In case of tiered pricingwhere the unit price varies for each quantity tier, this is the average unit price.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The amount for this line item. This is unitPrice*quantity.

discountAmount.title: Discountamount
discountAmount.description: The discount applied to this line item.

isTaxInclusive.title: Istaxinclusive
isTaxInclusive.description: Indicates whether (amount - discountAmount) is inclusive of taxes.

taxIdentifiers.title: Taxidentifiers
taxIdentifiers.description: The tax code fields of the product used for tax calculation.

subtotal.title: Subtotal
subtotal.description: The amount after discounts for this line item. This is amount - discountAmount.

isTaxable.title: Istaxable
isTaxable.description: Indicates whether this line item is taxable.

taxExemptType.description: The tax exemption type for a line item. This is a mandatory parameter while applying tax exemption on any line-item.

taxExemptReason.title: Taxexemptreason
taxExemptReason.description: The reason due to which a line item is exempted from tax. This is a mandatory parameter while applying tax exemption on any line-item.

exemptAmount.title: Exemptamount
exemptAmount.description: The part of this line item's subtotal that is exempted from tax.

taxableAmount.title: Taxableamount
taxableAmount.description: The part of this line item's subtotal that is taxable.

taxAmount.title: Taxamount
taxAmount.description: The tax payable for this line item. This is the sum of all taxes.taxAmount for this line item.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total for this line item after discounts and taxes. This is the same as subtotal if it is tax inclusive; otherwise it is subtotal + taxAmount. total can also be expressed as exemptAmount + taxableAmount + taxAmount.

isPartialTax.title: Ispartialtax
isPartialTax.description: Indicates if taxes were applied only partially for this line item.

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: List of taxes applied for this line item under each jurisdiction.

TaxEstimateLineItem.description: Represents the details of a line item in a tax estimation request.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the Customer in Chargebee.

customerCode.title: Customercode
customerCode.description: The unique identifier for the Customer in Chargebee.

address.description: Represents the address used for validation.

taxRegistrationNumber.title: Taxregistrationnumber
taxRegistrationNumber.description: The tax registration number of a business in a country. For example, this is the GSTIN for India or the VAT number for EU or Australia.

taxIdentifiers.title: Taxidentifiers
taxIdentifiers.description: It represents the information related to the customer's tax identifiers. This includes details such as exemption status etc.

number.title: Number
number.description: Index or serial number of the line item.

itemCode.title: Itemcode
itemCode.description: The unique identifier (in Chargebee) of the product correspondingto the line item. If the line item corresponds to a one-off charge,then this identifier is not present.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the line item.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The quantity associated with this line item.

unitPrice.title: Unitprice
unitPrice.description: The unit price for this line item. In case of tiered pricing where theunit price varies for each quantity tier, this is the average unit price.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The amount for this line item. This is unitPrice*quantity.

isTaxInclusive.title: Istaxinclusive
isTaxInclusive.description: Indicates whether the subtotal for this line item is inclusive of taxes.

isTaxable.title: Istaxable
isTaxable.description: Indicates whether this line item is taxable.

taxIdentifiers.title: Taxidentifiers
taxIdentifiers.description: The tax code fields of the product used for tax calculation.

taxExemptType.description: The tax exemption type for a line item. This is a mandatory parameter while applying tax exemption on any line-item.

taxExemptReason.title: Taxexemptreason
taxExemptReason.description: The reason due to which a line item is exempted from tax. This is a mandatory parameter while applying tax exemption on any line-item.

exemptAmount.title: Exemptamount
exemptAmount.description: The part of this line item's subtotal that is exempted from tax.

discountAmount.title: Discountamount
discountAmount.description: The discount applied to this line item.

subtotal.title: Subtotal
subtotal.description: The amount after discounts for this line item.This is amount - discountAmount.

taxableAmount.title: Taxableamount
taxableAmount.description: The part of this line item's subtotal that is taxable.

taxAmount.title: Taxamount
taxAmount.description: The tax payable for this line item. This is the sum of all taxes.taxAmount for this line item.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total for this line item after discounts and taxes. This is the same as subtotal if it is tax inclusive; otherwise it is subtotal + taxAmount. total can also be expressed as exemptAmount + taxableAmount + taxAmount.

isPartialTax.title: Ispartialtax
isPartialTax.description: Indicates if taxes were applied only partially for this line item.

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: List of taxes applied for this line item under each jurisdiction.
